text: Hagi Jekopu nagapinti'ma osi'a naga'ma zamatresage'za, kokankokama ru vahepima umani emanima hanaza vahe'mo'za, zafa ta'nopafima ruzahu ruzahu afi zagagafama mani'naza amu'nompima laioni maniaza nehu'za, sipisipi afu'ene meme afu kevuma maniza amu'nompi, hankavenentake hu'nea kasefa laionimo kva vahe'zami omani'negeno zamagumpi taka ureno ana afutamima zamaheno tagana taganu vaziaza hanige'za mago'a vahe'mo'za zamaza osugahaze.
